cast.name: 齐提萨克·帕通布拉纳 Jack Kittisak Patomburana
帕瓦蒂·可乔派萨恩 Pavadee Komchokpaisan

this_title: Love Songs Love Series ตอน X Years After คำสัญญา...เพื่อนรัก
introduction: 10 years after high school, five former schoolmates receive a letter from X, the only friend in the group who still lives in their hometown. In the letter, X mentioned a promise. Wondering what it is, they decide to return to their hometown, only to find out that X has disappeared. So they begin a quest to find him. During this time, they remember old stories, friendships, dreams, and love, as well as complexes. What is the mysterious promise of this group? And will they come across X?
chinese_title: Love Songs Love Series ตอน X Years After คำสัญญา...เพื่อนรัก
